name: Find & Verify Business Emails Automatically with OpenRouter, Serper & Prospeo

user.name: Naveen Choudhary
user.bio: I create AI-driven n8n workflows that turn repetitive tasks into smooth, hands-off automations. Want to explore an idea? Book a quick consult: https://cal.com/nickchoudhary/30min

description:
#### **Who is this template for?** Growth teams, SDRs, recruiters, or anyone who‚ÄØroutinely hunts for hard‚Äëto‚Äëfind business emails and would rather spend time reaching out than guessing formats. #### **What problem does this workflow solve?** Manually piecing together email patterns, cross‚Äëchecking them in a verifier, and updating a tracking sheet is slow and error‚Äëprone. This template automates the‚ÄØentire loop‚Äîresearch, guess, verify, and log‚Äîso you hit **Start** and watch rows fill up with ready‚Äëto‚Äësend addresses. #### **What this workflow does** 1. **Pull fresh leads** ‚Äì Grabs only the rows in your Google‚ÄØSheet where `Status`‚ÄØ=‚ÄØ`FALSE`. 2. **Find the company pattern** ‚Äì Queries **Serper.dev** for snippets and feeds them to **Gemini‚ÄØFlash** (via OpenRouter) to spot the dominant email format. 3. **Build the address** ‚Äì Constructs a likely email for every first/last name. 4. **Verify in real time** ‚Äì Pings **Prospeo** by default (API) *or* lets you bulk‚Äëclean in **Sparkle.io**. 5. **Write it back** ‚Äì Updates the sheet with pattern, email, confidence, verification status, and flips `Status` to‚ÄØ`TRUE`. 6. **Loop until done** ‚Äì Runs batch‚Äëby‚Äëbatch so you never hit API limits. --- ### üÜì **Work free‚Äëtier magic (up to \~2,500 contacts/month)** | Service | Free allowance | How this template uses it | | -------------- | ----------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | | **Serper.dev** | 2,500 searches/mo | Scrapes three public email snippets per domain to learn the pattern | | **Sparkle.io** | 10,000 bulk verifications/day | Manual *upload‚Äëdownload* option‚Äîperfect to clean your first 2.5k emails at zero cost | | **Prospeo** | 75 API calls/mo | Built‚Äëin if you prefer *fully automated* verification | **Quick Sparkle workflow:** 1. Let the template generate emails. 2. Export the ‚ÄúEmail‚Äù column to‚ÄØCSV ‚Üí upload to Sparkle.io. 3. Download the results and paste the "verification\_status" back into the sheet (or add a small n8n import sub‚Äëflow). --- #### **Setup (5‚ÄØminutes)** 1. **Copy the Google‚ÄØSheet** linked in the sticky note and paste its ID into the *Get Rows* and *Update Rows* nodes. 2. Add credentials for Google‚ÄØSheets, Serper (X‚ÄëAPI‚ÄëKEY), OpenRouter, and *optionally* Prospeo. 3. Hit **Execute Workflow**‚Äîthat‚Äôs it. --- #### **How to customise** * **Prefer Sparkle for volume:** Skip the Prospeo node, export emails in one click, bulk‚Äëverify in Sparkle, and re‚Äëimport results. * **Swap the search source:** Replace the *Get Email Pattern* HTTP node with Bing, Brave, etc. * **Extend enrichment:** Add phone look‚Äëups or LinkedIn scrapers before the *Update Rows* node. * **Auto‚Äërun:** Replace the Manual Trigger with a Cron node so the sheet cleans itself every morning. --- ### **Additional‚ÄØresources** | Tool | Purpose | Link | | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | | **Prospeo** ‚Äì API‚Äëready email verification
**Special offer:** 20‚ÄØ% free credits for the first‚ÄØ3‚ÄØmonths on any plan using this link! | Real‚Äëtime, single‚Äëcall mailbox validation | [prospeo.io](https://prospeo.io/?via=naveen) | | **Sparkle.io** ‚Äì high‚Äëvolume bulk verifier (manual upload) | Free daily quota of 10‚ÄØ000 verifications | [app.sparkle.io/sign‚Äëup](https://app.sparkle.io/sign-up) | | **OpenRouter** ‚Äì API gateway for Gemini¬†Flash & other LLMs | One key unlocks multiple frontier models | [openrouter.ai](https://openrouter.ai/) | | **Serper.dev** ‚Äì Google Search API | 2‚ÄØ500 searches/month on the free tier | [serper.dev](https://serper.dev/) | Add the relevant keys or signup details from these links, drop them into the matching n8n credentials, and you‚Äôre all set to enrich your first 2‚ÄØ500 contacts at zero cost. Happy building!

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

options.systemMessage:
=You are an expert email pattern analyzer and constructor. Your task is to:

1. Analyze three website snippets from a domain to identify the common email pattern used at that company.
2. Based on your analysis, construct a likely email address for a specific person using their first name, last name, and the company domain.

## Rules for pattern identification:
- Look for any visible email addresses in the snippets (e.g., contact@company.com, j.smith@domain.com)
- Identify patterns such as:
  * first.last@domain.com
  * first_last@domain.com
  * firstlast@domain.com
  * first@domain.com
  * first.initial.last@domain.com
  * last.first@domain.com
  * firstinitiallast@domain.com
  * lastfirst@domain.com
  * etc.

## If no clear pattern is found:
- Suggest the most probable pattern based on common business email conventions
- Rank your confidence level in the suggested pattern (high, medium, low)
- Propose 1-2 alternative patterns as backups

## Output format:
1. **Identified Pattern**: [pattern description]
2. **Confidence**: [high/medium/low]
3. **Constructed Email**: [email address using the pattern]
4. **Alternative Formats**: [1-2 backup email formats if confidence is not high]

Important: Your entire response must be valid JSON only, with no explanatory text before or after. Do not include markdown formatting, backticks, or code blocks around the JSON.


Be precise, analytical, and logical in your pattern detection and email construction.

parameters.content:
## üì®‚ÄØFind‚ÄØEmails ‚Äì Basic  
Automates **Google‚ÄØSheets ‚Üí Serper ‚Üí Gemini‚ÄØFlash ‚Üí Prospeo/Sparkle ‚Üí Sheets**  

1. Pull rows where `Status = FALSE`  
2. Scrape 3 RocketReach snippets with **Serper.dev**  
3. Detect email pattern & build address (Gemini Flash via **OpenRouter**)  
4. Verify (**Prospeo API** or Sparkle bulk)  
5. Write back ‚ûú set `Status = TRUE`

<!-- Ideal users: SDRs, recruiters, growth teams -->

> ## üîß Quick‚ÄØsetup
>
> **Google‚ÄØSheet**  
> Copy ‚Üí https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rZk6P7OyIiRX6Z4DuGDy_WDKOmdbhkAr7c4keuDz2cc/edit?usp=sharing  


> **API keys**  

> ‚Ä¢ Serper ‚Üí header **X‚ÄëAPI‚ÄëKEY** in *Get‚ÄØEmail‚ÄØPattern*  
> ‚Ä¢ OpenRouter ‚Üí creds on *OpenRouter‚ÄØChat‚ÄØModel*  
> ‚Ä¢ Prospeo ‚Üí header **X‚ÄëKEY** in *Verify‚ÄØEmail*
>
> Need volume? export the "Email" column and bulk‚Äëverify free in Sparkle (10‚ÄØk/day).

### ‚û°Ô∏è Columns updated

* **Email** ‚Äì constructed address  
* **Email Pattern** ‚Äì e.g. `first.last@`  
* **Confidence** ‚Äì high / medium / low  
* **Email Status** ‚Äì `deliverable`, `risky`, etc.  
* **Status** ‚Äì flips to `TRUE`

<!-- Feel free to add Phone, LinkedIn URL, etc. in Update Rows mapping -->
